mapper.insert: insert into combination (id, name, product_id, price, stock_quantity, sale_quantity, grade) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{stockQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{grade,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update combination set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, stock_quantity = #{stockQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_quantity = #{saleQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, product_id, price, stock_quantity, sale_quantity, grade from combination
